snippet: San Francisco supervisors voted unanimously Tuesday to approve health warnings on ads for sugary sodas and some other drinks.
abstract: San Francisco Board of Supervisors unanimously approves requirement within city limits that print advertising for sugary sodas and other drinks carry warnings about potential risks related to obesity, diabetes and other health problems; measure will be first in country if it receives second round of approval from supervisors and is not vetoed by mayor.
lead_paragraph: San Francisco supervisors voted unanimously Tuesday to approve health warnings on ads for sugary sodas and some other drinks.

headline.main: California: Labels on Ads for Sugary Soda Advance
headline.print_headline: California: Labels on Ads for Sugary Soda Advance
